id: scenario-value-scanner-teen-scenarios-community-teen contributes to community knowledge and improvement
title: Teen contributes to community knowledge and improvement
description: Teen contributes to community knowledge and improvement
content:
Scenario: Teen contributes to community knowledge and improvement
    Given Jasmine has insights about what works and doesn't work for teens
    And she uses community services and programs
    When the community seeks feedback about youth programs
    Then her input should be actively sought and valued
    And she should have voice in shaping community services
    And the community_elohim should facilitate youth feedback to reach decision-makers
    And her experience using systems should inform system improvement
    And communities should recognize that users have valuable knowledge about how systems function
    And teen voice should shape care economy design and implementation
